title: Adrenal Support
cleaned_text: Description Adrenal Support is designed to provide the body with the essential building factors the adrenal glands need to respond to the demands of today's stressful lifestyle.* Product info: [Sell Sheet link](https://magnoliapersonalizedmedicine.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/05/Adrenal-Support-sell-sheet.pdf) About the Ingredients: Glandular Support This product includes the highest quality "adrenal substance" (i.e. suprarenal substance) which is strictly tested and is safe for concentrated glandular support.* Nutritional Support This safe and effective supplement contains specific vitamins and minerals essential for energy and hormone production in the adrenals and includes the herbs eleuthero and licorice root to support healthy adrenal function.* Enzyme Delivery System This product includes an enzyme blend for effective delivery of these natural ingredients.* Warning: Do not take this product if pregnant or nursing. Disclaimer, Policies, Shipping Shipping Policy Most products ship within 2-3 business days of order receipt. Certain items ship within 7-10 business days. We reserve the right to consolidate shipments when the cart contains products from each fulfillment period. Return Policy We strive to provide products that will help you live a healthy life and our intent is to make you happy. Specialty Items are final sale and may not be returned. - 30 day money back on unopened products. Disclaimer The content of this website is based upon the opinion of Dr. Ellie Wright. The information on this website is not intended as medical advise nor to replace a one-on-one relationship with a qualified health care professional. Dr. Wright encourages you to make your own health care decisions based upon our research and to seek a qualified health care professional to help you. If you have a medical condition, if you are taking medications or if you are pregnant or nursing consult your health care professional before using products from this website. This website is intended to share information and knowledge obtained by Dr. Ellie Wright. FDA COMPLIANCE The information on this website has not been evaluated by the Food & Drug Administration or any other medical body. We do not aim to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness or disease. Information is shared for educational purposes only. You must consult your doctor before acting on any content on this website, especially if you are pregnant, nursing, taking medication or have a medical condition.
